item.title: Jupyter Kernels with Pyenv
item.description: Recently I wanted to run jupyter from within a pyenv environment, and using the environment itself to have isolation of versions of the python modules installed. I was not satisfied with the blogs I found online so I tried my own approach. First, I created a virtual environment using pyenv, pyenv install 3.11.4 pyenv virtualenv 3.11.4 chatbots-3.11.4 pyenv activate pip install jupyterlab ipykernel Which installed jupyter within the virtual environment chatbots-3.
